content.detailedDescription: Well as usual i am using the earth cam web site,that views the ny/nj hudson river area. i have been getting some strange pictures of very large crafts over this area. i cant say for sure they are alien in nature, but they are strange to say the least. these web cams are much better then the wired ny web cams i usually use. i think because of the infared capability of the cameras earth cam uses, well maybe thats why i get so many pictures of these big strange objects...Lets be honest, in this whole gigantic universe isn't it foolish and down right ignorent to think we are the only life that exists? come on people wake up...Ps i was off the air for 3 months...Well i'm back and i have awesome pics to proove you non-belivers wrong...Peace & love...Marko333 !!! watch the skies...There here my friends !!!
content.summary: More ufos over nyc/nj hudson river area
content.locationName: NJ/NYC HARBOR HUDSON RIVE, New Jersey

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from the store and was looking down the hill when it caught my eye. at first i thought it may be a balloon or some such.It had a semi triangle shape with another half circle shape behind it. the shapes moved at different speeds but the half circle one stayed behind it. it moved faster than the clouds around it. i was pretty freaked out and amazed so i kept watching it until it went behind the clouds. i tried to find it again by waiting for it to come out the other side of the cloud cover but it did not. it just disappeared! i have never seen anything like it before and have not seen it since. now every night i look to the sky, hoping....... (sigh)
content.summary: A triangle shaped object and a half circle object behind it with...Tendrils?

content.detailedDescription: Well as usual i am using the earth cam web site,that views the ny/nj hudson river area. i have been getting some strange pictures of very large crafts over this area. i cant say for sure they are alien in nature, but they are strange to say the least. these web cams are much better then the wired ny web cams i usually use. i think because of the infared capability of the cameras earth cam uses, well maybe thats why i get so many pictures of these big strange objects...Lets be honest, in this whole gigantic universe isn't it foolish and down right ignorent to think we are the only life that exists? come on people wake up...Ps i was off the air for 3 months...Well i'm back and i have awesome pics to proove you non-belivers wrong...Peace & love...Marko333 !!! watch the skies...There here my friends !!!
content.summary: Giant ufo over hudson river nj/ny area

content.detailedDescription:
Monday morning, i was headed to disney. i was catching the 6:45 am bus, and walked to the amelia side of the station wile waiting. it was cool and a little windy. it was 6:38 am when i saw... well.. i have video and pics. the pic when enlarged shows 3 lights- and nothing attached to them. i saw it after i had gotten on the bus- much larger, and still nothing to indicate any mass, structure, or anything other than the light housings. it had grown to about half dollar size by then. 

i just noticed that the video has recorded sounds- i am unsure if the sounds it recorded are of the object, or distorted traffic noise.
content.summary: Odd flashing lights no idea of structure..

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to move my car from the driveway to the street when i saw a low flying light between the 2 houses across the street. for the first second i thought it was going to be a plane on the runway pattern getting ready to land at midway a few miles away, but i noticed that the light was an unusual orange/red color that i can't even recreate, as i never saw anything that color before. it went from a south to north direction, like the runway pattern was, for about 3 seconds, then it started to head in a east to west direction at an uneven hover and as it moved toward me, as i was looking at it from a west to east position, i noticed that it slowly started to ascend as it got closer, then it went directly upward, at the same time it was doing this, i notice a plane on the very runway pattern i described earlier getting ready to land. the oject first appeared below the treeline and now at this point it was above and moving higher, i backed up toward my car and unlocked it and opened the door. i second later i looked down for a second and when i looked up it was gone.
 the object glowed with bright light and it was orange/red in color, but a shade i never seen in my life. it was round, but slightly elongated at the sides. it was quite low flying as i could see it between the two houses quite well.
content.summary: Orange/red light slightly long on the sides, round on the top and bottom low flying change direction and ascend.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out taking pictures of the night sky when i notice what i presumed to be a helicopter flying in the area. so i took a picture of it. after loading it into the computer and enlarging it i noticed that it was not like any helicopter i've ever seen and after enlarging it, it did not look like a helicopter at all. are we wittnessing the real life beginnings of an alien tranformers type deception. i know that this was not a helicopter, but what i'm asking is what is it exactly?

this is no joke. i believe that they are now imitating conventional craft to fly through our air space.

i could be wrong, but prove me wrong!
content.summary: Helicopter like object in the sky in my neighborhood, except glowing

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure if i can just post this.  that primary siting form would take all dy.  
anyway. this am at about 5:45 am pac time. i was outside having a smoke and looked up to a clear sky with stars.  saw, at first, waht ii assumed was a satellite heading ne.  then it blinked like a strobe.  i watched furthere and it did twice more.  wasn't aware satellites had strobes.  not too mention it disapppeared. and it was too high to be a plane.  maybe skylab.
who knows.
content.summary: Light in sky

content.detailedDescription: Since about saturday 2-4-2012, i have noticed aroud 645-7 a odd acting "star" compared to all the other stars i can see, this one seems to eminating some sort of multiple color rapidly. i cannot tell distance, but the best way to describe is the star effect used on lights with cameras. althgouh the peaks the shoot out of the "star" seem like some sort of reaction to moisture in the air. however, this object is always in the same spot. even as the moon has moved the object is stationary. i can be sure of this because of how my apartment is situated. the moon always is stuck between the backdrop inbetween these two house. so i use it for reference points. yesterday as i was looking at it, i could not stop. i found mysel fout there with no jacket for about 25-30 mins before i went back in side. i have noticed some other reports on here of something similar. just find it interesting. id take a picture but the camera phone will not do it justice, id need a super hi def recorder. if anyone lives in rhode island see if you can spot it tonight, im pretty sure it will be there. so it is possible it is simply a star that i hadnt noticed, but it still is worth the mentioning.
content.summary: 3 days this has been there, it looks like a star eminating tons of typical star like features

content.detailedDescription: Outside looking at mars in the sky when noticed a "flashing star".  at first thought it to be an airplane but then realized it was not moving like an airplane but hovering.  had jerky movements from side to side which i thought could be a helicopter.  had constant red light but flashed intermittent white, blue, green lights.  no sound.  many airplanes passed by while watching this.  at first the object was much lower in the horizon then the airplanes and could notice the flashing more.  but eventually the object got higher and was about the height of the airplanes flying by.  finally, the object must have been moving away from us as i could no longer see the lights flashing and it got so small it just looked like the other stars in the sky.  tried to take video footage of the event but would not capture what we were seeing.  we looked at it through binoculars.  saw a video on youtube that was a similar experience and looked just like what we saw.  took place in texas at the end of 2011.
content.summary: Strange object hovering with constant red light and flashing white, blue, green lights.

content.detailedDescription: Observed object at very high altitude(probabaly out of our atmospheric limits)travleing at various speeds from extremely fast, to slow, moving east-northeast from vantage point in ne pa. object did not have any lights. it was a very clear, and amlost full moon night, which was illuminating the outer atmosphere brightly. i believe i saw the object only by it being illuminated by the moon. the reason i say that is i was outside cooking, and was observing the sky. i saw the object appear from my right moving toward the left and changing speeds, but not trajectory.I watched the object until it went out of view. it appeared come into view, and go out of view once it was out of the correct vantage point to have the moons light reflecting off of it towards me.
content.summary: Large plane sized object moving rapidly at very high altitude. changed speeds. traveling e-ne

content.detailedDescription:
Feb 7th 2012 1:52 am got up could not sleep and looked out window to see two blinking ufos far apart from eachother
moving slow torwards the west in oak harbor washington , seen them until 2:05 then they were to far way to see
in oak harbor washington. 

 feb 7th 2012 3:20am i been playing flight sim game  got up to take break one out side agian to west , 
far away this time, might go try to look around .It is now 3:33 am it looks like is blinking more,
 red , yellow ,white ,blue colors .Looks like cluster of blinking lights ,cam batt dead !


feb 7th 2012 3:45am looked away from window for a min and ufo is gone again!

feb 7th 2012 4;15am looked out widnow again small plane flying from north flew around were ufos were until 4:45am
then left area going south. looked to be small slow flying plane with normal lights.

feb 7th 2012 5:15am see two planes flying fron north to south , both look like there looking for something ,
flying slow.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing lights , star like

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were sitting in the car last night. she was finishing a cigarette before we went inside. neither of us were really talking or doing anything in particular. the radio was on, she was fiddling with something and i was watching the our dog walk around the yard. 
for some strange and unknown reason we both looked up into the sky at the same place and same time and both said at the same time, "what the f*** is that?" 
it was a bright white light, almost blue but not quite, that was coming up from behind the tree line. the light was about twice the size of venus and i would estimate it to be quite a ways away, at least a mile or so. 
the light ascended straight up for about 5 seconds, slightly veered to the right and started to dim, and within another 5 seconds there was no light. it quickly faded away.
we were very excited about it, not afraid or freaked out.
content.summary: Bright light ascends from tree line and disappears

content.detailedDescription:
My nephew and i saw what we thought was an airplane descending and turning towards our local airport friday, 2/3/12 around 9:00 pm in northern waycross/ware county. we were going south on augusta ave traveling to a local video store and we followed it as it crossed above and it front of us to the right of us and it stopped completely and hovered over a neighborhood about 300 yards off the road we were on (south augusta ave). 

we stopped the truck and my nephew rolled down the window and the thing had absolutely no sound whatsoever. it sat stationary and looked like one long wing with a bright white light on each end of it. it looked as if it had a back cocked up a few feet of of the wing that was barely visible by the illumination from the white lights on each end of the main section that looked like a single wing. it was so close we could have shot it with a pellet gun. 

we watched it sit stationary for at least 2 minutes and then i put the truck in drive and drove as fast as i could to the next road to the right (about 30 yards) which took us into the neighborhood that it was sitting on top of. as we turned to the right we saw it still in the same position about a light pole length above the houses and trees. driving and staring at it only a block away, it vanished instantly. it did not fly up, down, left or right. it was simply gone as if someone had turned the lights out. 

we drove as close as we could to where it was ( maybe 60 feet from what would have been right under it) and there was no sign of anything. 

whatever it was it never made a sound. the length was a few longer than what the length would be from left wing tip to right wing tip of a small single engine plane.
content.summary: Single wing like craft with solid bright white lights on each end.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed a star-like large object near the star(s) saiph or rigel, unsure of which one, in orion.   it was slightly larger in size than this star  and equally as bright. it was moving very slowly and then it quickly faded into a very tiny light, the size of a satellite passing in the sky, and then quickly disappeared.  i observed the object for a few more seconds once the light had become small in size and then it was gone from my sight.  it's general slow direction was from roughly e to w.

i noticed the object as i was looking up at jupiter, then orion and other stars.  it simply caught my eye as not being part of orion.  i first thought that i was seeing the headlight of a large jet, as i live near a naval air base and often see large passenger jets flying between seattle, wa and vancouver, bc. however, i listened for quite a while for any jet noise and heard nothing. there was also very little (5%) sky cover at the time of my observation.    however, when the light got so small suddenly, like a satellite, i questioned what i was observing.  

i am a bit of a skeptic when it comes to ufo's and have never seen any object in the sky that i can't explain.  i am not quick to jump on a ufo band wagon without a large amount of proof.   tonight when i googled what i saw and read that others had posted a similar observation, i decided to post this sighting.  this is the first and only time i have ever questioned any sky observation and deemed it potentially unexplainable.  i do believe in the potential and overall likelihood of life outside of our planet and solar system.  after tonight, i am very anxious to find out if what i saw was an airplane or a perhaps as satellite that was reflecting light from the moon?  i would be much more excited to know that i actually saw a ufo!
content.summary: Bright light in orion near the star(s) saiph or rigel, that quickly faded to a tiny pin-prick and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: On monday night about 8:oo pm i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette and noticed the large, bright light in the western sky. an airplane flew above it and it appeared to rotate slowly, following the plane's movement. my parents (ages 56 & 57)and my 2 children (ages 6 & 8) also observed the lights/object while standing outside and from inside the house. it hovered in the sky, with lights changing colors from white to red to orange to yellow, etc...Randomly. looking through binoculars, i could not identify a distinct object, although the light pattern looked like the shape of a cross. after an hour or so, the object slowly moved west and was out of sight. the following evening, the light/object appeared in the same spot as the night before, and about the same time. again, after about an hour of hovering, it disappeared in a westerly direction. but, this time it re-appeared about 11pm and disappeared again about 15 minutes later.
content.summary: Bright lights hovering in sky for an hour then travels to west & disappears

content.detailedDescription: At 10:44 am on feb 6th, 2012 i walked out of my home looked up & saw this contrail. having never seen another like it i grabbed my camera & got this shot. there was no sound associated or heard over the normal city noise of the morning . davis-monthan afb is in the area as is tucson international airport, both have active military  fighter aircraft stationed there . the direction of this contrail crossed both facilities approaches .
content.summary: Looked up & saw contrail

content.detailedDescription: At 10:44 am on feb 6th, 2012 i walked out of my home looked up & saw this contrail. having never seen another like it i grabbed my camera & got this shot. there was no sound associated or heard over the normal city noise of the morning . davis-monthan afb is in the area as is tucson international airport, both have active military  fighter aircraft stationed there . the direction of this contrail crossed both facilities approaches .
content.summary: Looked up & saw contrail

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking pictures and didn't notice any other than a bright light in the sky. so i tried to take a picture of it and this is how it turned out.  unfortunately this is not the first time i've taken a picture and found something really strange going on in the photo. i wanted to attribute the weirdness to a low battery or improper settings but my battery tested fine and it was set on normal nighttime setting built into the camera.
content.summary: Unknown light show taken with digital camera while ufo was in the area

content.detailedDescription:
At about 6:23 pm i,and a friend was looking toward the south at venus, jupiter and orion, enjoying the view.  i noticed what i thought was a dim satellite about 1 degree above saiph in orions foot.  i pointed this out to my friend. the object was moving like any other satellite.  it appeared to be moving from the southeast toward the northwest and traveled about 1 degree before it faded out.  this object was very dim, about magnitude 4 or so, although it may have been brighter but for the almost full moon.  then the object faded from view.  immediately, as this object faded, another starlike object about magnitude -2 or so appeared below saiph.  i told my friend that the object we were seeing did not belong there.  it was brighter than sirius.  it did not move. as i watched in disbelief, another smaller object appeared (again about magnitude 4 or so) about a half degree away from the bright object and moved slowly away, toward the northeast.  the objects then both faded away together.  
as an amateur astronomer, i know the sky with some detail.  what i saw was not a star, planet,airplane, helicopter, or satellite.  i am reporting this in the hope that others also witnessed this event.  
thanks,
content.summary: Observed starlike object about 2 degrees below saiph in orion.  object did not move but two much smaller objects were associated with the main object. main object was as bright as jupiter.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend & i live on a 7th floor condo a couple of miles from the beach, our balcony faces southeast.  on this particular saturday just about 6:30 pm the weather was so nice we had turned off the a/c and opened all the windows and balcony to let some fresh air in.  we had the tv on sitting on the couch with our balcony to our left.  i don't to why but, we both looked outside to the sky at the same time, which is strange considering we were sitting on the couch really just watching tv.  we both spotted this white round light which had a long white bright tail, both of us exclaimed "wow!", it was so bright it actually lit up the sky (clouds) as it travelled south east over the ocean.  after about 5 seconds it disappeared.
we were left wondering what it was.  we are very used to air traffic and recognize the blinking lights from airplanes but, this was a light with a long tail, quite large.

to add to this mystery on the following night, again taking advantage of great weather... my sister, boyfriend & i were sitting outside on our balcony.  we were telling her the story, again around the same time (6:30 pm), actually we were pointing in the same direction of where we saw this thing the night before and just as we are pointing up at the sky, my sister says "what's that???" and we all see this smaller round object and it streaks accross the sky again in the same general direction.  this one was a lot smaller.  was this a meteor, it certainly looked like it could have been, but what are at the chances of seeing something 2 nights in a row?

after the weekend i return to work and tell a co-worker what happened.  she tells me that her & her husband were on the beach on saturday night and they saw a large white light and thought it was a falling star and she "made a wish".

i would sure like to know if others may have seen the same thing we saw...
content.summary: My boyfriend & i were witness to this sighting, we have never seen any aircraft that looked like this object.

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dogs to the park on the morning of february 5 2012 at 10:17am i observed 4 spheres hovering high in the sky.  while taking a break from walking my dogs and trying out my new app on my iphone (flightware) to track ga and commercial aircraft at the various airports i fly out of (i'm an avid and longtime pilot), i noticed a citation heading north over springfield massachusetts.  to see how acurate the application was, i was able to track all it's flight information, heading, speed, altitude, orgin and destination.  in my field of vision of the aircraft, something else caught my eye.  at what i beleive was well above 25k ft i obdserved a very large glowing orb stationary in the southwest sky (initially mistaken for a planet or a star in the moring sky-cavu conditions).  on the large glowing opaque sphere, i noticed what looked like a darker (black) band around the center.  seconds later a smaller orb appeared out of thin air directly next to it, then another, then another and possibly several hundred feet ahead, yet another glowing sphere ( 4 total).  the orb closest to the larger craft, started a slow and steady orbit around it for one full and complete orbit to only join the craft (looked like it must have either joined or was absorbed by the larger craft).  seconds later, in unison all three remaining craft started a slow and steady acceleration to the southwest until it was out of my sight.  i made notes, and times of the event and wrote down any and all details.  i also checked all air traffic in the area and there where no flights regestered on that path or altitude (flightware application).  no aircraft where in the area.  these where not stars, planets, helicopters or mylar balloons.  these where controlled craft.  i'm submitting my report in hopes that there where other witnesses.
content.summary: Witnessed 1 large sphere in the sky along with 3 smaller orbs hovering, then moving across the sky at high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my apartment on the 8th floor in the living room facing  my window.
the object fled across the sky so fast and the colors were so bright, i couldn't help noticing it. when i first saw it, i shouted to my husband- "it's a comet!" i thought it  was a comet because i saw a tail as well.
it sped across the sky shining bright purple and red colors. before it disappeared, it left behind what looked like fireworks. i got up to look out the window at a closer range, but i could see nothing.

my first reaction was to call 911 and see if others had reported seeing it.
the operator said no reports had been made. then i called the local tv station- tv 40 and asked if they had had any reports, and if the weather dept. knew of any activity, or meteors in the area. they checked and said no- that there had no been any reports of meteors or other activity.

i realized a comet or meteor could not be seen by the naked eye, so i was puzzled. yesterday, feb. 5 i called the air force and left a message about what i had seen and to inquire if there had been any reports about meteors to their knowledge, but have not heard back.

i made a rough drawing of the object, but i do not have a scanner in order to forward it to you at this time.

i'll keep the drawing on file if you wish to see it.
content.summary: I thought it was a comet. i was shaped like a tear drop and sped across the sky. i saw bright purple and red. finally, it disappeared and before it did do, it left what looked like purple fireworks.

content.detailedDescription:
On 2/6/2012 at approxamitely 1843 hrs, i went outside to catch a breath of fresh air. as soon as i opened the front door two (2) small craft were flying slowly in tandem head in a north westerly direction at a slow rate of speed.  as i watched them move away a third circlular vehicle much larger then the first two was also flying from the same position but headed in a southerly direction. as my attention was directed toward this craft it's brightly illuminated shape began to dim until it's light was completely out. this only took about 2-5 seconds.  it should also be pointed out that the third craft appeared to stationary when first noticed.

the first two craft's seem to have multible lights and there was a blinking strobe on them, but none could be seen on the third craft.
content.summary: Two small craft flying in tandem, third craft flew in different direction.

content.detailedDescription: For starters i am not crazy......That being said, i was outside and looked up like i always do and saw some stars and the moon. than i noticed 2 lights moving about 200 yards away from each other way up in the sky. they were moving too slow to be a meteor cause i see them often. the light in the front started to dim out then almost simultaneously the light behind it went out as well. there were 2 different craft cause the one in the back was off set to the left of it.
content.summary: 2 lights off set that dimmed out one after the other

content.detailedDescription:
A blue strobe light flashing so fast it was like it was always on , traveled left to right over kitchener toward cambridge kind of like a flight path over the golf course and if i was to get of the landing spot based on the degree of decent, i would say blair rd. or st-george st near the grand river. once it left my sight i waiting to hear a explosion or a boom even a flash from impact but nothing it was gone. just 8 seconds of a passing light. so if it didn't crash then it landed would be my conclution, but it was out of my sight.
 i seen it for 8 seconds . the object had to be  3 or 4 miles away and the size was 
about the size of a large home , the shape was  square with no sharp corners, kind of like a work truck's yellow flashing lights you see around on pick-ups. but the colouring was 
dark blue then light blue bands from top to bottom, strobing real fast. with a small glow or was it a blur, not sure . the sky was clear and it was morning twilight. i have seen the air balloons in kitchener , and this was not one of them. and not that early in the am. the size of the air balloon
at the same distance may be a 1/4 , of what i seen. i got a clear eye full and have felt weird about it all day. has someone else told me the story or i read it from here lets say. i could not believe it.
however i have seen something not local.
content.summary: Sitting on my bed looking out window where a tree once was a blue and white or two tone blue object went from left to right , flashing like a strobe light so fast it was like it was always on. was doing a 20 degree decent 3 miles a way at 1500 mile hr

content.summary: Sitting on my bed looking out window where a tree once was a blue and white or two tone blue object went from left to right , flashing like a strobe light so fast it was like it was always on. was doing a 20 degree decent 3 miles a way at 1500 mile hr

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were just leaving a friends house after the super bowl. we pulled out of his driveway, and that is exactly when him and i saw the light hovering over the woods about less than a mile away from us in the west. we started driving south, down the road, which intersects reinmiller road. right when we reached the end of the road it darted off to the left extremely fast. we tracked it for just a few seconds before it disappeared. so then we thought maybe it was a helicopter, so we drove further down reinmiller to see if there was any sight of it, but no, there wasn't any sight of it. it was gone. there were no lights in the sky. then we thought it was maybe a airplane that had flown into cloud cover, but then we told each other that it was a clear night; just stars in the sky. i've had one sighting similar to this, this past summer in july. i don't exactly like to talk about it, due to people never believing me. but what i saw last night was very interesting. it was weird how the object went to the left for about 10 seconds and then completely disappeared. we couldn't exactly tell what color it was, but noticed it was more triangular shaped and it had about 3 lights on it that blinked off and on. the lights were a bright, white color. this recent sighting was the most convincing of the 2 total sightings i've had in joplin. i always hope that someone else saw what i saw that night, because it's very annoying when no one seems to believe you.
content.summary: A triangular object with an estimated 3 bright white lights that blinked off and on. object hovered for a few seconds, then darted off to the left very quick, and then completely disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to georgia one night from alabama on hwy 278 i noticed a bright light in the distance i thought no big deal its a airplane bcuz it was coming down from the sky like a airplane all of the sudden it came at me so fast i slammed on the brakes bcuz i thought this thing is fixing to land in the middle of the road then nothing black sky the thing vanished i thought maybe some red neck is spotlighting deer then i was like no way it was an object of light an not a beam that was in the late summer of 1997
content.summary: I was driving to georgia at night as i was driving i noticed a light in the ditance it got bigger and seemed to be coming right at me

content.detailedDescription: I was relaxing out on the patio, just sitting and taking in the view. i live in a midrise apartment building on the third floor, in a hilly area of san antonio.  my balcony faces the south and i enjoy sitting and just looking at the hills and the sky.  one night, i believe it was around the middle of september of 2011, i noticed a search light panning the sky; i am guessing it was around 11pm or so.  the light was going back and forth only about 15 degrees horizontally, just sort of lighting up a cloud formation; it was an interesting cloud but i cant recall its features.  i just sat there and whatched to cloud slowly shifting its shape as the light scanned through it back and forth.  after about 10 minutes or so, a bright sphere just appeared out of nowhere off to my right and at about the same elevation as the clouds.  the area it came from was cloudless as the night was only partly cloudy.  the objest was a creamy white and kind of blue green as i remember; it was about half the size of a bb in my perspective.  the object appeared travelling at a very high rate of speed, made kind of a semi-circular loop and zipped into the middle of the cloud that the search light was panning (painting?).  the object then just dissappeared as fast as it appeared, the entire incident (the orb or whatever) lasted only about a second, if that.  what was really odd was that immediately after the object dissappeared into the cloud, the search light ceased.  i was not freaked out at seeing what to me was obviously an unidentifiable object in the sky (no aerospace technology i am aware of can manuever like that), i just thought it was kind of cool, like seeing a random shooting star.  what was eery, and what i had failed to consider until immediately afterwards, was the search light ...It was horizontal, not vertical, and there was no platform, no manmade or other structure for it to be fixed to unless it was on a helicopter, but it was too powerful and broad of a light path to be mounted on a helicopter.  this would have had to been a full size light, the kind used to light up the sky at a big sales event or something.  i leaned over my balcony at that point to see just where the light had be coming from and wondered ***???  now that was strange.  there was no-where, at least that i could determine, that this light could have emanated from.  my conclusion was that the ufo or whatever it was, was anticipated and the light in the sky was giving it a vector, showing it where to go.  it has been months since this happened and i have not observed a horizontal search light since.  i stated above that there was a plane overhead but i cant say i remember one, which is due mostly to the fact that i live under a very busy flight path for the san antonio airport, jets are always going overhead.  let me be clear: i have always whatched the skies, even as a child, thats just something i do; i know the difference between a man-made (not to include classified and secret) air ship and an anamoly, i also know a meteorite when i see one ...This was niether.  it had a smooth flight path, was bright but not too bright, it appeared, swooped around and into the cloud and vanished, all in the blink of an eye.  and just where did the spot light come from???  if i had known about this organization back then, i would have reported it immediately, while it was still fresh in my mind.
content.summary: A small bright sphere appeared out of nowhere, made a semi loop and disappeared into a cloud that was being hilighted by a horizontal search light.

content.detailedDescription: I went to the va hospital in wilkes barre, pa on 2/6/12 and was x-rayed for pain in my left elbox. technicians asked me if i had any wires or any defibrillators implanted into my left arm and i said, "no". they asked me to take more x-rays. i went home and called my cardiologist in syracuse, ny and he said he had never touched my left arm. the implant is about 10cm in length (5 inches or longer on the x-ray, but goes beyond the visible portion of the x-ray towards my left shoulder). i have no idea where it ends and this seems like a serious matter. i am very frightened by this and i have no memory of how it got there. i have obtained a copy of the x-ray which i am sending in this mufon sighting report. please contact me as soon as possible.
content.summary: I have an implant of a wire antennae (no visible scars) which seems to be attached to a transmitter. photo of x-ray is attached.
